title: 5 Heartwarming Valentine’s Day Breakfast Recipes
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Valentine’s Day is just a few days away and if you’re looking for ways to surprise that special someone, here are a few breakfast-in-bed recipes to treat them with.

  1. Savory Sweet Potato Fritters

These fritters have a sweet potato base and are topped with mashed avocado and a fried egg. To make a heart-shaped egg, simply use a pancake mold. The recipe calls for one medium sized sweet potato, three Chino Valley Ranchers pasture raised eggs (for a bright orange color), 1 ½ tablespoons chives, one avocado, two tablespoons olive oil, a few cherry tomatoes, and seasoning to taste.

View the full recipe here.

  1. Poached Eggs in Marinara Sauce

A hearty and savory dish, poached eggs in marinara sauce are packed with protein, healthy fats, and satiating carbs. For the recipe, you’ll need 1 ½ cups marinara sauce, six basil leaves, three to four eggs, ¼ cup Parmesan cheese, two to four slices of baguette, and seasoning to taste.

View the full recipe here.

  1. Rosemary Potato Flatbread

If bread and cheese makes your tastebuds water, then this recipe is just what you need. To make this heavenly potato flatbread, you’ll need extra virgin olive oil, gold baby potatoes, flatbread (or cauliflower pizza crust), gruyere cheese, rosemary, eggs, and seasoning.

View the full recipe here.

  1. Heirloom Tomato Burrata Toast With Poached Eggs

Colorful and gooey, this toast with poached eggs is a healthy and delicious start to a beautiful day spent with your loved one. You’ll need white vinegar, Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, artisan bread, burrata cheese, tomatoes, basil leaves, and balsamic glaze.

View the full recipe here.

  1. Bacon Rose Quiche

Cut bacon slices into roses and place them in the center of the quiche for a stunning surprise. For this recipe, you’ll need a nine inch unbaked deep dish pie crust, bacon, butter, olive oil, crimini mushrooms, a small onion, Swiss cheese, Gruyere cheese, onions, Chino Valley Ranchers eggs, heavy whipping cream, salt, garlic powder, white sugar, ground nutmeg, and cayenne pepper.

View the full recipe here.
